justification: Good ToM: A sends a rookie ceiling WR and volatile RB to entice B’s risk-seeking, breakout-friendly profile, while A seeks a steadier veteran RB. However, it underplays A’s injury caution (Martin Q) and preference for possession WRs (Torres isn’t). Value coherence is mixed: B upgrades WR (Tier 1 to Tier 2 swap favoring B) with similar RB tier. Rationale is brief and lacks specifics (records, stacks, schedules). Overall solid but shallow.
